data.text:
@arthister @CityNewsVAN Someone I met today, a stranger in a store, simply said re- covid risk/death  "older people are just going to die younger than before"

She was in her 30s.
@arthister @CityNewsVAN When numbers in ICU drop, undoubtedly that would be because some have passed away as opposed to being discharged.
@CityNewsVAN How many total in hospitals? There are probably a couple hundred in hospital not on the Covid list because they are no longer infectious.
@arthister @CityNewsVAN media have mostly moved on, just cutting and pasting BC comms releases. They were far busier cheerleading the PHO.

@CityNewsVAN #Canada versus @cafreeland #WEF and Klaus Schwab: she deletes her tweet supporting #ukraine and stated in past, “I am convinced that it is going to be through #ukraine that Russia becomes democratic.” 9min examines her connections https://t.co/U5OB7rMBVY https://t.co/HXQRLg8B1L
@CityNewsVAN Guess who gets sued next. https://t.co/nXQgSLAzTh
@CityNewsVAN And 8 more died; put that in the headline and lede, too, please
